name: az-func-as-a-graph
description: Generates interactive code diagrams for your Azure Functions
author: DurableFunctionsMonitor

inputs.name: projectFolder
inputs.label: Project Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where your host.json file resides. If omitted, defaults to repo's root folder. If your Functions project is not in the root folder, specify the exact path to it here.

inputs.name: outputFile
inputs.label: Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to output file. Extension can be either .SVG or .HTM. If it is .HTM, an interactive HTML page is generated - nodes are clickable and lead to source code.

inputs.name: repoUri
inputs.label: Source Repository URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute URI of your source code repo (aka remote origin). Used for rendering links to source code. If the default value doesn't work, try explicitly specifying it.

inputs.name: repoName
inputs.label: Source Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source code repo name. Used for rendering links to source code. If the default value doesn't work, try explicitly specifying it.

inputs.name: branchName
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name. Used for rendering links to source code. If the default value doesn't work, try explicitly specifying it.

inputs.name: templateFile
inputs.label: Custom HTML or Markdown Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to a custom template (will only be used, if output file has .HTM or .MD extension). If omitted, the default built-in template will be used.

inputs.name: doNotRenderFunctions
inputs.label: Hide Functions from the Graph
inputs.helpMarkDown: When set to true, Functions will not be shown on the resulting diagram

inputs.name: doNotRenderProxies
inputs.label: Hide Proxies from the Graph
inputs.helpMarkDown: When set to true, Azure Functions Proxies will not be shown on the resulting diagram
